lines.text: The wizard has a bullet hole in him, so...
That tells us the identity of the burnt corpse, by...
...um, can we check his gun and see who it was registered to?
...Well. That's a good idea, and it's standard procedure...
But it's three in the mornin', and the registration office is closed. We'd need to wait a few hours.
I sure wish I had one of those. Remind me why I don't, again?
Same reason my blood's 50% coffee by volume, kid. I don't like this any more than you do.
Anyway, we'll check the gun later, but keep looking for now.
